item.description:
12th Annual Red Dress Run for Women - A 5K event for all participants
A 5K run/walk celebrating women’s fitness

Saturday, July 11, 2009
Start Time: 8:30 AM
Asylum Avenue, Hartford, CT

The 12th annual Hartford Women’s Race “The Red Dress Run For Women” is a 5K event that truly celebrates women’s fitness and health. The start and finish line will be in beautiful Elizabeth Park, where over 15,000 roses will be in full bloom.

DEADLINE FOR RED DRESS RUN - Print, complete and mail or fax according to instructions on the form. Payment may be made by credit card or check (made payable to HMF). - Paper copies must by postmarked or faxed by - Friday, July 3, 2009.

Start Time: 8:30 a.m.
Start in Elizabeth Park next to the Rose Garden.
Counter clockwise around the full west loop
Right to exit park onto Walbridge
Right onto Bainbridge
Right onto North Quaker
Right onto Asylum
Right on Prospect
Into Elizabeth Park at first entrance
Through park to finish line

Post-Race Festivities

The positive post-race atmosphere is fostered by music, awards and the renowned buffet spread, which features our signature post race, guilt-free, FRESH STRAWBERRY SHORTCAKE for all participants and volunteers.

Also back by popular demand is the FINISH LINE VILLAGE, a vibrant festival of tents filled with information, goods and services important to athletic, fit women's lives.

2008 representatives included ConnectiCare, Women's Health Connecticut, Mary Kay, Lucy from Blue Back Square and many others.
If you are interested in showcasing your business or product at this year's expo. Sign up as expo vendor at the 2009 Red Dress Run for Women
item.name: 12th Annual Red Dress Run for Women
